title: Will North Korea start World War III? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/2/17
itunes:title: Will North Korea start World War III? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/2/17
description:
George Noory and guest Greg Hunter, a former reporter for ABC News, discuss the growing threat of a nuclear confrontation with North Korea and if we are close to World War III.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
